name: Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Allignment and heights set out by surveyor. Post locations marked out
Acceptance Criteria - Levels and positions set out match dimensions specified on drawings privoded
Verifying Document - Complience surveys or spot checks
Frequency - Prior to the commencements of Works
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Confirm bearing capacity of founded ground
Acceptance Criteria - Bearing capacity not less than 150kpa tested to the pile embedment depth of 2.9m or as agreed by the engineer
Frequency - Prior to the commencements of Works
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Excavate post holes
Acceptance Criteria - Holes are clean and measurement match Drawings
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Confirm using H5 poles and check dimensions
Acceptance Criteria - Size and length of pole are suitable and match drawings or agreed by the engineer
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - 20 MPa concrete
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - 110mm perforated subsoil drain at base of wall, AP20 washed drainage material filter fabric around subsoil
Acceptance Criteria - Installed as specified in drawings or as approved by the engineer
Inspection Point: Quality Control Activity - Backfill behind retaining wall with clean free draining material
Acceptance Criteria - Backfill with approved fill material
Inspection Type (Visual, other) - On site Inspection
